description:
Rei tries to stop Mamiya from getting married and Kenshiro and Raoh finally have their epic battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yoreyorei Yoreyorei! Rei yo Ai o Torimodose / Sono Toki wa Kita! Kenshirou vs Raou Shibireru Kessen!
Yororei Yororei! Rei, Take Back the Love \ The Time Has Come! Kenshiro vs. Raoh, The Intense Battle!
ヨロレイヨロレイ! レイよ愛をとりもどせ / その時は来た! ケンシロウvsラオウ しびれる決戦!
